name: John Tsubasa Rivals
description: Captain Tsubasa -Rivals- on Telegram/LINE are click-games that’s built in the ton and kaia ecosystem with the official authorization of the world famous Captain Tsubasa IP. We target the large base of Ton ecosystem users, Line’s high-spending users, core blockchain game users, Captain Tsubasa’s mobile game users and the fans of Tsubasa IP all over the world. $JOHN is the core token for the game. Users can earn seasonal airdrops by playing the game.
